data.name: Gem Worlds
data.detailed_description:
Join Our Community


Come hang out with us on Discord! https://discord.gg/frKXYtG


About the Game

Gem Worlds is a puzzle roguelike hybrid.

  • Explore 50 uniquely-generated levels across 5 unique worlds
  • Collect gems, dodge boulders, escape to survive
  • Fight monsters (or avoid them) using a variety of skills
  • Unlock and upgrade more than 10 diverse skills across multiple runs
  • Exploit biome-specific obstacles including mines, teleporters, and more


Exploit obstacles to your advantage.



Use more than 10 skills to survive.



Collect gems, but watch out for boulders.



Using gems collected across all your runs, upgrade and customize your character to suit your play-style. Die, and try again with a different combination of skills.

Accessibility

Accessibility matters! Gem Worlds contains several accessibility features, including:
  • A free, up-to-date playable demo
  • Large, readable font
  • Entirely turn-based, with no quick-time events
  • Invincibility mode (toggle on and off at any time)
  • A select few skills that make the game much easier
  • And more!

data.short_description: Gem World is a roguelike-puzzle hybrid. Explore 50 levels in 5 unique worlds. Dodge boulders, collect gems, fight (or avoid) monsters. Unlock and upgrade more than 10 diverse skills across multiple runs. Exploit obstacles like mines, teleporters, and more. Turn-based and easy to play.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 8.1
  • Processor: Intel Core2 Duo 2.4GHz or equivalent
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 5000 or better
  • Storage: 100 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: 12.x Monterey
  • Processor: Intel-based
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Storage: 100 MB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Manjaro 19+
  • Processor: Intel Core2 Duo 2.4GHz or equivalent
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Storage: 100 MB available space
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
